opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Thomas M. Cooley Law School v. American Bar Association

opinion:
127 S.Ct. 985 (2007)

THOMAS M. COOLEY LAW SCHOOL, petitioner,
v.
The AMERICAN BAR ASSOCIATION, et al.

No. 06-668.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 8, 2007.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
